channel.title: A good 317 source to work off? Edgeville based
channel.description:
Looking for a good edgeville based 317 source shops etc in edgeville. godswords, dclaws etc.
anyone know the best source i could work off that suits my standards.. been looking for a while but havent found anything that has really interest me yet..

item.title: A good 317 source to work off? Edgeville based
item.dc:creator: @murda_sho murda sho.
item.description:
@murda_sho wrote:

Sorry guys for the confusion, I’m not trying to do any advanced coding/programming etc I’m just trying to find a source that has the requirements I posted in the O.P. (Edgeville, 317 PS with Godswords & Dclaws etc.)

New to coding & interested in starting a PS.

Thanks though.

Read full topic
item.source: A good 317 source to work off? Edgeville based

item.title: A good 317 source to work off? Edgeville based
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:7, topic:451989”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=554870.msg4063623#msg4063623 date=1343667441]

A good 317 base you say? I’m going to disregard everything else you said and respond to this part.
Also, requests aren’t allowed.

  1. Hyperion
  2. Apollo
  3. Shard Revolution
  4. RuneSource

Do you not get the fact some people aren’t eligible to work with these kinds of servers? Don’t give such stupid replies.

@OP
Anything you’re comfortable with programming/learning off of. Try to learn the basics of programming before you jump into RuneScape private servers though.

When you’re interested in getting people to actually learn Java to help advance this community - try recommending them these Bases to work with.

Do you not get the fact some people aren’t eligible to work with these kinds of servers? Don’t give such stupid replies.

That was disrespectful and totally uncalled for.

Since when does putting them in an environment they’re not ready to work with ‘advance’ the community, or teach them how to program?
[/quote]

Since when does putting them in an environment where everything is ass-backwards, halfway done and not even done with effort teach them how to program? This is the fucking problem right here.[/quote]

Since when have I suggested he should use project insanity? Or any server for that matter? I suggested he learn to program before he jumps into the runescape private server development. So no, it seems I have not dropped my ball, but you have dropped yours - and here it is.

Read full topic
